Nigerian Export-Import Bank (NEXIM) bụ ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka ego na Naịjirịa, nke e guzobere na afo 1991
N'ọrụ ya, NEXIM na-elekwasị anya na mmepe na mgbasawanye nke ngalaba ndị na-abụghị mmanụ nke akụ na ụba Naijiria, na ebumnache iji belata ịdabere na mba ahụ na mbupụ mmanụ.

Ọrụ NEXIM bụ ịbawanye ọnụego mbupụ nke ngwaahịa na-abụghị mmanụ maka obere, ọkara, na nnukwu ụlọ ọrụ na ngalaba niile nke akụ na ụba site n'inye ego, mmemme na-ebu ihe ize ndụ, na ọrụ ndụmọdụ dịka iwu azụmahịa gọmentị si dị.

Isi ụlọ ọrụ Nexim dị na NEXIM House, Central Business District, Garki, Abuja, Nigeria. Ụlọ Nexim nwere ókèala site na Kur Mohammed Avenue n'ebe ugwu, Ahmadu Bello Way n'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ na Constitution Avenue n'akụkụ ndịda
E guzobere NEXIM na afo 1991 dị ka njikọ aka n'etiti Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN) na Federal Ministry of Finance Incorporated (MOFI), na isi obodo mbụ nke NGN: 50,000,000,000 (ihe dịka
US $ 132 nde na ego 2021. *Rịba ama: US$1.00 = NGN379.52 na 27 Febụwarị, na afo 2021.
Dị ka ebe nrụọrụ weebụ ụlọ akụ ahụ si kwuo, ụfọdụ n'ime ọrụ ya gụnyere ihe ndị a:
"Nnye ndokwa nke nkwa ego mbupụ na mkpuchi ego mbupụ nye ndị ahịa ruru eru".
"Nkwado ego na ego obodo nye ndị ahịa ya iji kwado mbupụ".
"Nkwado nke ego mgbanwe mba ọzọ maka ịgbazinye ndị na-ebupụ ihe ndị chọrọ mbubata ihe si mba ọzọ iji mee ka mmepụta mbupụ dị mfe".
"Nkwado nke usoro ozi azụmahịa iji kwado azụmahịa mbupụ".
Ụlọ ọrụ ego ahụ bụ nke CBN na MOFI, na 50/50.
Ka ọ na-erule 31 Disemba 2015, ngụkọta akụ ụlọ akụ ahụ ruru NGN:64,731,403,000 (ihe dịka
US $ 170,562,000 na ego nke 2021), na isi obodo nke NGN:41,150,885,000 (US $ 108,429,000). *Rịba ama: US$1.00 = NGN379.52 na 27 Febụwarị 2021.
